Key Match Events: Curry added four assists, a rebound and a block.
He also added an assist and was a team-high +7 in the second quarter.
Curry's game came to an early end after he endured multiple injuries to his left ankle.
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors were down 10 when he exited the game.
The Warriors will hope his injury doesn't hurt them in the long run as their hopes of success rely heavily on Curry without a second bonafide All-Star on the roster.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Curry opened things up for the Warriors, making the first two shots from the field, which came from beyond the arc, before missing his first on a third attempt.
Andrew Wiggins tried to keep it close, but it wasn't enough, as the Clippers got 20+ points from three players.
Wiggins had 29 points on 11 of 15 shots.
